section.title: Overview
section.para: Release notes for the Spring 2008 release of the Taverna Workbench, v1.7.1.

section.title: Fixes and new features in Taverna 1 codebase in this release
section.para: See myGrid JIRA issue tracking for more detail at http://www.mygrid.org.uk/jira. The following outstanding issues with older releases have been fixed in this one :

listitem.para: TAV-732 : documentation is out of date
TAV-553 : Fetching results unpredictable
TAV-709 : T2 Enactment Error with pauls workflow
TAV-700 : Column 'thing' too short in LogBook database schema
TAV-716 : Remote execution service using outdated Taverna profile
TAV-721 : T2 Validation fails for processors containing merged ports
TAV-200 : Embedded browser within taverna (recommended work around using beanshell)
TAV-737 : Allow multiple implementations of the Monitor interface
TAV-682 : Disconnected outputs fails workflow
TAV-726 : Mac OS X plist file improvements
TAV-664 : Serialise bean to stream instead of file
TAV-724 : T2 FileDataManager and FileBlobStore uses File.mkdirs which isn't thread-safe
TAV-736 : T2 Renderers
TAV-710 : T2 input dialogue doesn't open after an error
TAV-244 : The execution version of the workflow should be the same as the edit version
TAV-731 : goViz is not there
TAV-715 : Avoid Raven/maven dependency for remote execution service
TAV-680 : Failing workflows goes to empty results
TAV-742 : JTidyWorkerTest fails due to character set assumptions
TAV-713 : Workflow scavenger dropping ports and script content for Rshell
TAV-679 : Default "Metadata" tab for input/output ports confusing
TAV-574 : Nested workflow location
TAV-719 : TestJavaProcess failed during Maven build
TAV-728 : Add Unknown Host Exception in PluginManager

section.title: Taverna 2 Technology Preview 2
section.para: Has various updates to the look and feel, including a monitor based view of the workflow which shows where events are happening during a workflow run and result rendering according to their MIME type.
